pages.title: /tpa [username]
pages.text: Use the  command '/tpa [username]' to request to teleport.

pages.title: /tpahere [username]
pages.text: Use the command '/tpahere [username]' to request someone to teleport to you.

pages.title: /tpaaccept
pages.text: Use the command '/tpaaccept' to accept teleport requests, or simply press 'Accept' or 'Decline' in chat.
